name: summar-ai-powered-summarizer
description: Summarizes the content of web pages and PDFs using the OpenAI API.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp src/styles.css dist/styles.css && cp src/models.json dist/models.json && cp src/prompts.json dist/prompts.json && zip -j dist/summar.zip dist/manifest.json dist/styles.css dist/main.js dist/models.json dist/prompts.json
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
